content.question: What are all values of <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="negative pi less or equal than theta less or equal than pi"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, for which <math alttext="2 cos theta greater than negative 1"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>θ</mi><mo>></mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="2 sin theta greater than square root of 3"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mpadded lspace="+1px"><mi>θ</mi><mo>></mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mpadded></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction less than theta less than fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo><</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

<math alttext="pi over 6 less than theta less than fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo><</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>​ only

​<math alttext="negative fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction less than theta less than fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo><</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>​ only

​​<math alttext="pi over 3 less than theta less than fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo><</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>​ only

content.answer: ​​<math alttext="pi over 3 less than theta less than fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 3 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo><</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>​ only

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
